sections.text:
76-272.Affidavits to correct defects; validity.

All such instruments now appearing of record in the chain of title to any real estate, are legalized; and they shall have the same force and effect as those herein provided for.

SourceLaws 1913, c. 75, § 2, p. 219;R.S.1913, § 6254;C.S.1922, § 5653;C.S.1929, § 76-259;R.S.1943, § 76-272.

Annotations

Affidavit recorded in office of register of deeds is prima facie evidence of facts stated therein. Schlake v. Healey, 108 Neb. 35, 187 N.W. 427 (1922).
